tutorials.title: Database Vault Overview
tutorials.description: Understand what Database Vault is and what it can do

tutorials.title: Getting Connected
tutorials.description: How to get connected to the workshop environment

tutorials.title: Enable Database Vault
tutorials.description: This lab will walk you through how to enable Database Vault for the workshop image

tutorials.title: How to create a simple realm
tutorials.description: In this lab you will create a realm to protect sensitve data in an application schema

tutorials.title: How to configure multi-factor authorization / trusted path
tutorials.description: In this lab you will configure Database Vault to verify a users session factors before allowing access to sensitive data

tutorials.title: How to use Simulation Mode
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to use simulation mode to test you Database Vault policies

tutorials.title: How to use Operations Control
tutorials.description: Learn how to leverage the Operations Control feature of Database Vault to protect pluggable databases from container admins

tutorials.title: Disabling Database Vault
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to disable Database Vault.
